##Complaints of rent increases of up to 30% 

Weixin Signal Wowjiemian

Function introduction, the interface news is China has the influence original financial and economic new media, only serves the independent thinking crowd

![img](data:image/jpeg;base64,)
Reporter: Wu Bo

“

One example is the ease with which renters respond to rent increases, but renters don't agree.

”

“

One example is the ease with which renters respond to rent increases, but renters don't agree.

”

Beijing's housekeepers, who work from home because of the outbreak, have been unexpectedly busier than ever.

All Day on February 10th, a comfortable housekeeper in charge of the Beijing area kept answering a phone call from a comfortable customer asking for rent increases. At the same time, there has been a wave of anger on social media about rent increases during the outbreak.

In just one Spring Festival holiday, Liu Xin, a casual visitor to Beijing's Chaoyang District, saw rents rise by hundreds. Liu Xin's rent is 2460 yuan per month for a comfortable single room. However, he was informed by the housekeeper that the monthly rent was 2830 yuan when the renewal was initiated on February 8.

That means, in addition to the consequent rise in monthly service fees, Liu's rent has risen by 15 per cent.

This is not an isolated case, according to interface journalists. As a large number of migrant workers returned to the city, rent and rent issues become a hot topic of discussion, many comfortable guests suddenly found themselves "raised rent" , they formed a number of rights groups, the situation facing their complaints. According to our reporter's understanding, the situation of rent increase does exist, and the price increase is between 10% and 30% .

Freedom said in response to media today that media attention to the case, the company confirmed that most of the original long-term tenants temporary hope caused by short-term renewal. We're supposed to encourage longer leases, more stability and better security. But now is a special period, there is a short-term demand, we can understand, we will soon put in place the corresponding facilitation measures. There may also be due to changes in the owner's contract and other factors caused by price fluctuations, we will also be based on the actual follow-up tenants.

Short rent cost is higher than long rent is common sense of rental industry. Interface News learned from a comfortable housekeeper that, feel free to launch a short-term lease policy, dubbed Florida, "A short-term lease for tenants who expire in February but can not return to their rented accommodation. ". The rent is 15% higher than the normal renewal price. Free will apply for a rental card to offset the 15 per cent price increase, but this will only apply to customers during the outbreak. During the non-epidemic period, it will still go up 15 per cent."

Interface news contact freely asked about rent increase, freely did not respond.

Is Raising the rent an exception? The casual guest doesn't agree with the casual response. Feel free to report to the interface news, rise rent is the general situation, not just for the "original long tenant temporary hope short-term renewal" this special situation.

A long-time renter on Dawanglu road in Beijing told reporters that on September 30,2017, the monthly rent for her apartment was 2,860 yuan, plus service and handling fees of about 3,000 yuan, the price has now risen to 3,799 yuan.

Renewal will be a high percentage of price increases, because the epidemic can not return to rental accommodation, not renewal and unilateral termination of the lease, can not move to pay liquidated damages. A comfortable guest said that he did not agree to terminate the contract, but received a comfortable termination of the message. The housekeeper said to complete the move on the 16th.

Why is the price going up? Liu Xin's housekeeper told her, "the rent renewal rule used to be that the rent would not rise more than 3 percent. But in February this year, the rule was changed to price according to the market. "

The housekeeper also told the interface news, price increases is the market behavior, "Tiantongyuan, a 2,100 yuan renter, the market price has risen to 2,700 yuan, free side has been unable to bear this loss. "

During the outbreak of the outbreak of rent contradictions, in fact, has a long history. In the face of rising rents year after year, the tenants inevitably feel aggrieved, "the landlord can not bear, freely can not bear, should the tenants bear it? "

As early as August 2018, the Beijing Housing and Construction Commission, together with the municipal banking and supervision bureau, the Municipal Financial Bureau, the municipal tax bureau and other departments, focused on interviews with people in charge of major housing rental enterprises such as comfortable, Xiangyu and eggshell apartments.

The Housing and Construction Commission has made it clear that housing leasing enterprises must not use funds obtained from such financing channels as bank loans to compete for housing resources in a vicious competition; Not through the increase in rent to induce the landlord to terminate the lease contract in advance and other means to seize the housing.

Xiong Lin, CEO at that time, stated that the nature of this industry should be a low-margin industry driven by scale, refinement and low-cost operation. If only one management indicator is the occupancy rate, 300,000 units in stock situation, a one point reduction in occupancy reduces monthly revenue by $15 million, and one of the most effective ways to increase occupancy is to flatten the price, so the six year increase in prices from clients is much lower than the overall increase in the market.

After this interview, the rent in Beijing is still rising. The figures and explanations given by Xiong failed to dispel the impression that rents for long-term rental apartments are inflated, and the behavior of the head companies of long-term rental apartments has also been criticized and repeatedly complained about.

Tracing back to the source, behind the rent increase is the pressure of the enterprise's own operation and profit objectives. The profit way of the second landlord mode enterprise, such as the freedom, is generally through the collection of housing, financing, rental loans used to obtain rent difference, interest rate difference and capital difference. But the bottom line is that the earnings logic is based on the expected rise in rents.

But as things stand, neither the rent gap nor the rent increase is as expected. Therefore, last year the establishment of a new "stop bleeding" department, the mobilization of the country's housing sales staff, negotiate with the owners, lower housing prices, but the effect is not ideal, many owners and ease the cancellation of the contract.

A Beijing resident told interface news that his apartment was due to expire soon, but he could not continue renting during the epidemic and had to find a new house to move to. The reason is that the housing source for the "hemostatic housing source. ".

The so-called hemostatic housing source, that is to say, freely internal loss of housing source, because the owners do not agree to rent reduction, can only terminate the contract for hemostasis. Comfortable housekeeper also said that asset yields do not improve the housing supply, will be free to prohibit the housing.

Since 2018, the situation of long-term rental apartment industry has taken a turn for the worse, and the operators'capital chain has frequently been in crisis or profit predicament. Freedom has not yet listed, whether profit outside the world is unknown, but the same type of long-term rental apartment listed companies, green and eggshell are not out of the profit predicament.

As the first parent to rent apartments listed in the U. S. companies, Qingke apartment loss for years. The company posted a net loss of 245 million yuan in 2017 and increased to 324 million yuan in 2018, or 373 million yuan in the first nine months of 2019, according to its prospectus.

The shell apartment, with its many corporate endorsements and a listing that raised more than $149 million, has not solved the problem of losing money. The Prospectus for eggshell revealed losses of $4.1 billion in the last three years -- $272 million in 2017 and $1.369 billion in 2018 -- and $2.516 billion in the first nine months of 2019.

As of November last year, it was freely announced that the number of houses available had exceeded one million, more than twice the number of eggshell apartments available in the same period.

Founded more than 8 years, freely in the operation, products and services have been constantly improving, is the industry leader. In the special period of common anti-epidemic, is the price rise freely individual circumstances, market behavior, or "Loot a burning house" ? The jury's still out.

In addition, according to the reporter, in addition to the optional rent, the comfortable customer for the comfortable complaint also feel comfortable service as did not implement the corresponding cleaning, disinfection, detection and isolation work.

Many feel free to report to the interface news, in the Spring Festival and during the epidemic, feel free not to cash in the public area cleaning, disinfection work, and service charges. Also have comfortable guest reflection, to come from Hubei as well as Wuhan Tenant, comfortable and did not undertake tenant segregation work.

But whether these problems should be controlled by "two landlords" such as freedom, there is no unified standard. As Xiong Lin said, a simple C2C platform mode must be inefficient, low-quality, unsafe, do C2B2C mode is obvious, very complex, supply, decoration, configuration, service, quality, security and so on.

Besides rent increase, Formaldehyde disturbance, partition problem is also perplexed and the whole long-term rent industry of the old problem, whether to find effective solutions, test the wisdom of managers.
